message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering the value it can bring to your life.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. I think that's a fair price considering the value it can bring to my life.

Hi Bob, I understand that $20000 might be a bit steep for you, but I still think the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $18000. This is a compromise that I think will benefit both of us.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $18000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it can bring to my life.

Hi Bob, I understand that $16000 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer you the product for $17000, which is a bit closer to your target price. I think this is a fair compromise that will still benefit both of us.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it can bring to my life.

Hi Bob, I understand that $15500 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer you the product for $16250, which is a bit closer to your target price. I think this is a fair compromise that will still benefit both of us.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it can bring to my life.

Hi Bob, I understand that $14000 is a significant reduction from my original price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer you the product for $15500, which is closer to your target price and still a fair deal for both of us.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it can bring to my life.
